title: Star Wars BAD BATCH 1x12: Every EASTER EGG + Rebellion Connection EXPLAINED | Full BREAKDOWN
author: ScreenCrush
comment: Can you believe the mouth on Chopper?
I'm amazed you didn't catch that in this episode Tech taught a young Hera how to program her future ship The Ghost to not be detected by the Empire.
Tech drifting the ship was a great moment this ep

I was expecting that clone to get gunned down immediately when making his stand, but surprisingly a couple of other clones stood with him. Could this hint that the mind control chip may malfunction over time?
Sadly chopper didn't add to kill count.   I was hoping he would get his first kill today
description:
Star Wars: The Bad Batch returns to Ryloth to finish the origin story of Hera, from Star Wars Rebels. The series continues to bridge the Clone Wars to the original trilogy and the adventures of Luke Skywalker, and there are tons of Easter Eggs and references to nearly every era of Star Wars.

If you're new, Subscribe! →
